ValidationRule.description: From SP-4727 - If Status of case moves to 'On Hold', field 'On Hold Reason' must have an entry.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "FP_Restaurant_Operations", ISPICKVAL(Status, 'On Hold'), ISBLANK(On_Hold_Reason__c), NOT( $Permission.Exclude_from_Validation ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select an "On Hold" reason before putting the case On Hold.
